enabled.name: Enable SharedControl
enabled.hint: Master toggle to enable or disable the SharedControl module.

touchOnlyMode.name: Hide Cursor (Touch-Only Mode)
touchOnlyMode.hint: Hides the mouse cursor for dedicated touch screen setups. The tap workflow works for both mouse and touch when the module is enabled.

tapTolerance.name: Tap Tolerance
tapTolerance.hint: Distance in pixels for determining if two taps are in the same location (default: 25px).

trackMovement.name: Track Movement Distance
trackMovement.hint: Color-code movement paths based on character speed (green = allowed, yellow = slightly over, red = too far). Reads movement speed from character sheet.

animationSpeed.name: Animation Speed
animationSpeed.hint: Duration in milliseconds for each grid square during token movement animation (default: 200ms). Lower = faster.

debugMode.name: Debug Mode
debugMode.hint: Enable verbose console logging for troubleshooting. Disable for normal use.

enableGestures.name: Enable Touch Gestures
enableGestures.hint: Allow pinch-to-zoom and swipe-to-pan gestures on the canvas. Disabled by default to prevent accidental movements.

lockButtonRoles.name: Lock Button Visibility
lockButtonRoles.hint: Minimum user role required to see and use the lock button. When locked, all zoom/pan controls are disabled for everyone.

showOverlayControls.name: Show Overlay Controls
showOverlayControls.hint: Display on-screen buttons for zooming and panning the map. Useful for touch screens.

overlayButtonSize.name: Overlay Button Size
overlayButtonSize.hint: Size of the overlay control buttons in pixels (default: 50px).

overlayPosition.name: Overlay Position
overlayPosition.hint: Where to display the zoom/pan control panel on the screen.

notifications.libWrapperMissing: SharedControl recommends the libWrapper module for best compatibility with other modules.
notifications.touchVTTDetected: SharedControl detected TouchVTT is active. Some features may overlap.
notifications.insufficientMovement: Insufficient movement remaining for this action.
notifications.movementBlocked: No valid path to that location. The destination may be blocked by walls or unreachable.
notifications.outOfBounds: That location is outside the map boundaries.
notifications.noPermission: You do not have permission to move that token.
